radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver demonstrates no focal or textural abnormalities. There is no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation with the common bile duct measuring up to 3 mm. The main portal vein is patent with appropriate hepatopetal flow. There is gallbladder wall thickening measuring up to 10 mm. The GB is mildly distended. A calcified gallstone is demonstrated within the gallbladder neck. There was a negative sonographic ___ sign. There is no pericholecystic fluid.
